attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: My pet orangutan went missing last night because I didn’t pay for my Popeyes food :( The restaurant got my information and went to my house and stole my pet I’m so upset. This app needs to get taken down because this could happen to someone else!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is so bad and awful do not get it it was the “astroid” that made dinosaurs extinct it is terrible it is like a microwave the gets food cold honestly got the app to see if the reviews about killing pet dinosaurs was real and it is my pet dinosaur I’m so sorry to I form everyone but he has died to how bad of an app this is

attributes.title: this app is absolutely HORRIFIC.
attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app, all i saw was this bright orange oompa loompa! I downloaded this app to i could preach about my AMAZING president DONALD TRUMP, and talk to other rednecks about how racism i am! i am NOT a fan of the WILLYWONKA FRANCHISE, and i’m DISGUSTED. Please remove this from the app store, after i opened the app i had to get surgery on my eyes. it made me BLIND. 0/10 DISAPPOINTING!!!!😫😩😭😔😔✨

attributes.title: Horrid and Disgusting
attributes.review:
The app is not only terrible and glitchy but it’s not intuitive or easy to use at all. I’ve had such a struggle with the app and supporting our president (May he Rest In Peace) with this app. 
Some problems I’ve noticed: 
-uses the wrong flag 
-drains phone battery 
-it’s made my phone glitch 
-overheats the phone
-stole my sanity 
-continues to discredit the problems that many poc and black lives go through 
-stole my cat 
-ate my left shoe 
-is hard to use (slow and unintuitive) 

Overall the app needs a lot of work.

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: This app is horrible 🤮 making my phone glitch😪 then in order to log in I had to see an orange oompa loompa 😡 I will NOT stand for this!! I can’t even use my phone correctly anymore😥 just the thought of that horrid creature who is the face of this app makes my life worse 🤧

attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i’d leave one star if i could!! as soon as i downloaded this app my phone battery PLUMMETED!!! my phone kept glitching out and turning off and on...it got so bad that my apple tv started glitching!! i had to buy a new one, this app fried it!! donald trump 2020??? not anymore!! he cost me a lot of money!! do not download!!!!

attributes.title: ¡Horrible!
attributes.review: This app stole all of my cheese! As soon as I downloaded it to see what the great Cheeto had to say my cheese simply disappeared. My family nor I did not eat the cheese. It was taken by Cheeto minions as soon as the app was downloaded! I don’t recommend this app to anyone unless you want to get rid of your cheese!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded to see my favorite oompa loompa but instead I saw a cowboy riding a unicorn and was VERY disturbed. This app told me that I should microwave my pet rock and I was not impressed because I love rocky and I hate this app. The app also told me that I should pour the milk first then my cereal and I was so shocked that a app could be so terrible!!!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have EVER had. It crashes all the time, as well as taking all my battery! I can’t believe that Apple even let this bad quality app onto their store! PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP! I believe it’s stealing my battery WITHOUT MY CONSENT to give to the Russians! All these children are leaving weird bad reviews but MINE IS REAL! APPLE TAKE THIS APP DOWN!

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: You know I downloaded this app for truly I don’t know what reason but as soon as I opened it I wanted to wash my eyes out with bleach!!! It is absolutely horrible. I wouldn’t recommend spending your time on a terrible app, it’s absolutely disgusting. Save your time and eyes and don’t download it.
